entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Emulator/Android crashes when clicking a button (connected WCF service with NET MAUI for database) #22506
  • CarouselView change programmatically Position property or CurrentItem Property throw Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: 'The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first.' #22504
  • No Android SDK instance matching the 'C:\Program File(x86)\Android\android-sdk' path #22502

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] Navigation Toolbar broken #18902

PullRequests

Created

  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger - fix #22503
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    community ✨, area-controls-editor

Updated

  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Make "IsConnected" public #22500
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [X] rename XFC to XC #22488
    area-xaml, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Some fixes I needed #22494
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • Add switch to BlazorWebView to configure 'fire and forget' for Android Disposal #22496
    area-blazor
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
